means: 偷偷摸摸地，暗中进行地

sentence.Network_en: Surreptitiously Mark looked at his watch.
Ah Chen, sitting in the corner, was smiling surreptitiously behind her hand.
sentence.Network_cn: 坐在墙角的阿珍却掩着嘴暗笑.

sentence.Network_en: The Lius then exchanged glances and smiled surreptitiously.

entry.tran: 秘密的;鬼鬼祟祟的;偷偷摸摸的
entry.def: A surreptitious action is done secretly.

example.ex: He made a surreptitious entrance to the club through the little door in the brick wall...
example.tran: 他从砖墙的小门偷偷进入俱乐部。
他们有过几次秘密会谈。
